page.title: 15Leisure in Wheelock
page.content: Most people in Wheelock go out for their leisure and spend some of the weekend{shopping.}They go{swimming}at Sandbach Leisure Centre and Crewe Baths.Most of the swimmers are children, and they go for the Fun Swim with their friends. They go to the{roller discos}and they are good skaters. The adults play{tennis}and {squash}and some have indoor{football teams. There is{keep-fit}as well. Some people go for{walks}round Wheelock. Families go along the canal to see the boats and along the old railway to see the wild flowers and trees. They walk along the country lanes because it is quiet. They watch{television}most of the time and also go to the{pub}for a drink. There are three pubs,the Cheshire Cheese,the Nag's Head and the Commercial Hotel.
